import { useState } from "react" import React from "react"; function PizzaBlock({ title, price, img, sizes, types }) { const [activeType, setActiveType] = React.useState(0) const [] = React.useState(0) const typeNames = ['тонькое', 'традиционное']; return (

{title}

    {types.map((type) => (
  • setActiveType(type)} className={activeType == type ? 'active' : ''}>{typeNames[type]}
    • ))}
    {sizes.map((value, index) => (
  • setActiveSize(index) } className={activeType == index ? 'active' : ''}>{value} см.
    • ))}
от {price} ₸
) } export default PizzaBlock
